attributes.action: Remove Sex offenders and paedophiles from Sycamore Lodge bail hostel, Langley, Sandwell, West Midlands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The former pub, Sycamore Lodge, has housed offenders for some 17 years and throughout that time has attracted consistent but low-level controversy. But there are still Paedophiles and Sex Offenders living in Sycamore Lodge bail hostel,Langley.
With 5 schools in the immediate area, we want them moved out.
